faq.title: Common Questions Answered
faq.faq1q: Does StrideGuide really work completely offline?
faq.faq1a: Yes! StrideGuide processes everything on your device. Once installed, you never need an internet connection for obstacle detection, voice guidance, or any core features. Perfect for users without data plans or in areas with poor reception.
faq.faq2q: Is the free version really free forever?
faq.faq2a: Absolutely. The free version gives you 2 hours of daily guidance, obstacle detection, emergency SOS, and basic lost item finding - all completely free, no credit card required, forever.
faq.faq3q: Will this work with my screen reader?
faq.faq3a: Yes! StrideGuide is fully compatible with VoiceOver (iOS) and TalkBack (Android). All buttons have descriptive labels, and we use proper ARIA semantics throughout the app.
faq.faq4q: How accurate is the obstacle detection?
faq.faq4a: Our AI model achieves 92% accuracy for common obstacles (steps, curbs, poles, people). The AI runs directly on your phone using TensorFlow Lite, providing near-instant alerts without cloud delays.
faq.faq5q: What phones does this work on?
faq.faq5a: StrideGuide works on any modern smartphone (iPhone 8+ or Android 9+). As a Progressive Web App, there's no app store download required - just visit our website and install.
faq.faq6q: How does the emergency SOS work?
faq.faq6a: Press and hold the SOS button for 3 seconds. StrideGuide will automatically send a text message to your emergency contact with your location (if GPS available). The app also includes fall detection that automatically triggers SOS if a hard fall is detected.

seo.footer: StrideGuide is a free AI-powered vision assistant designed specifically for blind, low vision, and senior users in Canada, United States, and Europe. Our offline-first approach means all AI obstacle detection runs directly on your device, ensuring complete privacy and zero data usage. With full bilingual support in English and French, emergency SOS features, and accessibility-first design, StrideGuide empowers users to navigate independently without compromising safety or privacy. Perfect for seniors without data plans, visually impaired users who need reliable navigation, and anyone requiring assistive technology that just works.
